product_name: Royal Robbins Terra Knickers - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering great sun protection and stretch, the women's Royal Robbins Terra Knickers will be your choice for hiking, clamming and kayaking and all summer activities in between. Ripstop nylon with spandex is wrinkle resistant, moisture wicking and of course, stretchy. Offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection from harmful UV rays. Hand pockets reinforced with metal rivets; back patch pockets, 1 with a zipper. Royal Robbins Terra Knickers feature tapered-leg styling and have a 16 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Offering great sun protection and stretch, the women's Royal Robbins Terra Knickers will be your choice for hiking, clamming and kayaking and all summer activities in between.
